titles.title: Expressing support for a National Day of Unity in response to the President's call for a national dialogue on race.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 6/19/1997--Introduced. Calls for a Day of National Unity to be established in order to facilitate a national dialogue on race and so that Americans can celebrate their unity and their commitment to liberty and justice for all.
